airmon-ng_not_found.diagnosis: The airmon-ng command is not installed or not in PATH
airmon-ng_not_found.solution: Install aircrack-ng package: 'sudo apt install aircrack-ng' and ensure the tool is in your PATH.

permission_denied.diagnosis: The process lacks required privileges to access system resources or network interfaces
permission_denied.solution: Run the tool with sudo or as root user, as most penetration testing tools require administrative privileges

interface_not_supported.error_message: Interface does not support monitoring mode
interface_not_supported.diagnosis: Your WiFi adapter does not support monitor mode, which is required for many wireless security testing features
interface_not_supported.solution: Use a compatible WiFi adapter that supports monitor mode (e.g., Alfa AWUS036ACH, TP-Link TL-WN722N v1)

no_interface_found.error_message: No interface found. Need to provide an interface name.
no_interface_found.diagnosis: The tool couldn't find any wireless network interfaces
no_interface_found.solution: Make sure your WiFi adapter is properly connected. Run 'iwconfig' to see available wireless interfaces

deauthentication_failed.error_message: Deauthentication failed. Packet injection may not be working.
deauthentication_failed.diagnosis: Your WiFi adapter may not support packet injection or the driver may not be properly configured
deauthentication_failed.solution: Use a WiFi adapter known to support packet injection, verify the driver supports injection, and ensure the target is in range

handshake_not_captured.diagnosis: The deauthentication didn't cause any clients to reconnect, or clients may not be present
handshake_not_captured.solution: Ensure clients are connected to the target network, try increasing the number of deauthentication packets, and make sure you're close enough to the target

monitor_mode_failed.diagnosis: Unable to put the wireless interface into monitor mode due to driver issues or hardware limitations
monitor_mode_failed.solution: Try manually setting monitor mode: 'sudo airmon-ng check kill' then 'sudo airmon-ng start [interface]', or try a different wireless adapter

subprocess_error.diagnosis: An external command failed to execute properly
subprocess_error.solution: Check that all required dependencies are installed, verify command paths and parameters are correct

wordlist_not_found.diagnosis: The specified wordlist file does not exist or the path is incorrect
wordlist_not_found.solution: Verify the wordlist path is correct, download missing wordlists, or specify a different wordlist

cap_file_corrupt.diagnosis: The capture file may be corrupted or in an unsupported format
cap_file_corrupt.solution: Try capturing a new handshake or convert the file format using tools like Wireshark

scapy_import_error.diagnosis: The Scapy library is not installed, which is needed for packet manipulation
scapy_import_error.solution: Install Scapy using pip: 'pip install scapy'

tkinter_error.diagnosis: Tkinter is not installed, which is needed for the GUI
tkinter_error.solution: Install Tkinter package: 'sudo apt install python3-tk'

aircrack_error.error_message: Failed to open capture file for reading
aircrack_error.diagnosis: Aircrack-ng can't open the capture file due to format issues or permissions
aircrack_error.solution: Verify the file exists, has read permissions, and is a valid capture file format

wps_pin_not_found.diagnosis: The WPS PIN could not be recovered, possibly due to router protections or too many attempts
wps_pin_not_found.solution: Try using a different attack method, ensure router has WPS enabled and is vulnerable to PIN recovery attacks

network_connection_error.diagnosis: Could not establish connection to the target network
network_connection_error.solution: Verify the password or credentials are correct, ensure the network is in range, and check for MAC filtering

hashcat_gpu_error.diagnosis: Hashcat cannot find a compatible GPU for accelerated cracking
hashcat_gpu_error.solution: Verify GPU drivers are installed correctly, or use CPU-based cracking with -D 1 option

no_targets_found.diagnosis: No wireless networks were detected during the scan
no_targets_found.solution: Ensure your adapter is in monitor mode, you're within range of networks, and try increasing scan duration

disk_space_error.diagnosis: Not enough disk space for capture files or temporary data
disk_space_error.solution: Free up disk space, specify a different output directory with more space, or clean up old capture files

macchanger_error.diagnosis: Failed to change the MAC address of the interface
macchanger_error.solution: Ensure the interface is down before changing MAC, and run with sudo/root privileges
